name: Cricket
discri: A captivating team sport where players aim to score runs by hitting a ball with a bat and running between wickets. It combines strategy, skill, and endurance, making it a favorite pastime and competitive game enjoyed by millions worldwide. Perfect for bringing excitement and camaraderie to picnics, parks, and fields.
